facet.name: collection
facet.description: The collection to which the resource or tool belongs
facet.definition: The collection to which a resource or tool belongs. A resource or tool can only belong to one collection. A collection is based on a specific (legacy) archive or a certain type of resource within such an archive or centre. The members of a collection share basic metadata vocabularies for the information displayed in the VLO.

facet.name: projectName
facet.description: The project within which the resource or tool was created
facet.definition: The name of the project(s) originally involved in the creation of the resource or tool, also if these projects no longer exist or are not the ones to be contacted regarding the resource/tool, which is often the case.

facet.name: name
facet.description: The name of the resource or tool
facet.definition: The full public name of the resource or tool.

facet.name: temporalCoverage
facet.description: The temporal coverage of the source material of the resource
facet.definition: The temporal coverage of the source material of the resource, i.e. not the time within which the resource was created, but when e.g. original texts were written or speech recordings made.

facet.name: continent
facet.description: The continent of origin of the source material of the resource
facet.definition: The continent of origin of the source material of the resource, i.e. not the continent in which the resource was created, but where e.g. original texts were written or speech recordings made.

facet.name: country
facet.description: The country of origin of the source material of the resource
facet.definition: The country of origin of the source material of the resource, i.e. not the country in which the resource was created, but where e.g. original texts were written or speech recordings made.

facet.name: languageCode
facet.description: The object language relevant for the resource or tool
facet.definition: The object language relevant for the resource or tool, i.e. the language of the source material of a resource, the object language of a language description, or the language supported by a linguistic tool. If a tool is language independent, please use the ISO 639-3 'und' for 'undefined'.

facet.name: _languageName
facet.description: Language name

facet.name: availability
facet.description: The usage conditions for the resource or tool
facet.definition: A rough description of the conditions under which the resource or tool can be used.

facet.name: licenseType
facet.description: Distribution and/or licence class (public, academic or restricted)
facet.definition: A rights-based classification of language resources and tools, indicating the scope of the target audience

facet.name: license
facet.description: The licensing conditions for the resource or tool
facet.definition: The name of the license or a very brief description of the licensing conditions under which the resource or tool can be used.

facet.name: accessInfo
facet.description: TODO...
facet.definition: TODO...

facet.name: organisation
facet.description: The organisation currently responsible for the resource or tool
facet.definition: The name of the organisation currently responsible for the resource or tool, i.e. to be contacted with any questions or requests regarding the metadata or access to the resource/tool.

facet.name: genre
facet.description: The genre of the content of the resource
facet.definition: The conventionalized discourse or text type of the content of the resource, consistently applied within the collection.

facet.name: modality
facet.description: The modality of the content of the resource or intended for the tool
facet.definition: The channel by which the signs in the content of the resource were transmitted or the modality for which a tool is intended, e.g. to regonize speech, gestures or entities of a text.

facet.name: subject
facet.description: The subject or topic of the content of the resource
facet.definition: The subject or topic of the content of the resource, consistently applied within the collection.

facet.name: description
facet.description: A general description of the resource or tool
facet.definition: A general description of the resource or tool apropriate for the VLO context, i.e. for a specific language resource or tool.

facet.name: resourceClass
facet.description: The type of the resource or tool (e.g. corpus, lexicon, grammar, tool...)
facet.definition: The type of the resource or tool (e.g. corpus, lexicon, grammar, tool...).

facet.name: format
facet.description: The mime types used in the resource or by the tool
facet.definition: The mime types of the files in the resource or consumed/produced by the tool.

facet.name: keywords
facet.description: Keywords describing the resource or tool
facet.definition: Keywords containing relevant information on the resource or tool not stated in other VLO metadata facets, consistently applied within the collection.

facet.name: lifeCycleStatus
facet.description: The status in the life cycle of the resource or tool
facet.definition: The status in the life cycle of the resource or tool.

facet.name: distributionType
facet.description: The audience for which the resource or tool is available
facet.definition: A rights-based classification of language resources and tools, indicating the scope of the target audience (PUB/ACA/RES).

facet.name: rightsHolder
facet.description: The rights holder of the resource or tool
facet.definition: The person or organization holding the full rights for the resource or tool.

facet.name: creator
facet.description: The creator of the resource or tool
facet.definition: The person or organization taking part in the creation process of the resource or tool.
